books.author: by Vince Flynn
books.description: The counterterrorism operative Mitch Rapp searches for a missing C.I.A. asset amid treachery in Afghanistan.
books.name: THE LAST MAN

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross confronts both a hostage situation and a terrorist act at Christmas.
books.name: MERRY CHRISTMAS, ALEX CROSS

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange this information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: The final volume of the Inn BoonsBoro trilogy sees sparks fly between Ryder Montgomery and the innkeeper.
books.name: THE PERFECT HOPE

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Raine Miller
books.description: In Book 2 of the Blackstone Affair trilogy, Brynne has left Ethan, but he is determined to win her back.
books.name: ALL IN

books.author: by Ian McEwan
books.description: A British woman working for MI5 in 1972 falls in love with a writer the service is clandestinely supporting.
books.name: SWEET TOOTH

books.author: by Yann Martel
books.description: A teenage boy and a 450-pound tiger are thrown together in a lifeboat after a shipwreck; originally published in 2002 and now a movie.
books.name: LIFE OF PI

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Eva and Gideon, of “Bared to You,” continue to struggle to make their relationship work.
books.name: REFLECTED IN YOU

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Dirk Cussler
books.description: Dirk Pitt and his team look for the truth about a sophisticated attack submarine.
books.name: POSEIDON'S ARROW

books.author: by Jessica Sorensen
books.description: Childhood friends, long separated, get back together.
books.name: THE SECRET OF ELLA AND MICHA

books.author: by Raine Miller
books.description: Ethan Blackstone, a London businessman, buys a portrait and is determined to bed its model, Brynne Bennett, an American art student. Book 1 of the Blackstone Affair trilogy.
books.name: NAKED
